title: Tricho logo
content:
Can someone help me identify both of the typefaces in this logo? Sorry, this is the largest size I have.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LOGOsub.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164008/http:/typophile.com/files/LOGOsub.jpg) | 9.71 KB |

 [‹ Any ideas on this one...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42492 "Go to previous forum topic") [Shook Magazine FONT ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42849 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nick

comments.content: Sanvito is a good call. On the Tricho website they use three different fonts for the “salon & spa” part of the logo. They are also using Scala on their menu pdfs but I don’t think that the salon/spa part is Scala in any of the three instances.
